ok code merged in release area on util, ready to resume code push (presuming parameters.yml.deploy already updated on all the nodes!)

[~mark.ladwig@ansira.com] [~graham.pinkston@ansira.com] hey guys, sorry i'm a little confused on this one. It looks like it got pushed to PROD and Shorter signed off saying it's good to close. 

Was that premature? Seems like there is still work being done.

[~Mike.Rakes@Ansira.com] Graham had a comment "Waiting on merge conflict solution." which meant it wasnt quite pushed.  (edit: which i resolved Friday) Since Shorter is testing for the "absence of a feature" he had no way of knowing.  To mitigate risk I think this should be pushed monday morning for a quick retest.
So to confirm, I should do a full prod deployment?
